com.ibm.achievement.service
Class EmployeeManagement

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.web.context.support.SpringBeanAutowiringSupport
      com.ibm.achievement.service.EmployeeManagement

public class EmployeeManagement
extends org.springframework.web.context.support.SpringBeanAutowiringSupport

EmployeeManagement class provide operations like find employee by employee id, find employee by manager id or find employee by email address. All methods are exposed as web services

Since:
2015-03-31
Version:
1.0
Author:
use@in.ibm.com
